mapper.sql: id, user_name, name, up_id, type, up_time, status, domain, email, QQ, bankname, bankcode, bankaddress, mobile, cid, rmk, d_user_type, referral_code
mapper.insert: insert into t_proxy_user (id, user_name, name, up_id, type, up_time, status, domain, email, QQ, bankname, bankcode, bankaddress, mobile, cid, rmk, d_user_type, referral_code ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{referralCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_proxy_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_id = #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankcode = #{bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankaddress = #{bankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_user_type = #{dUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
referral_code = #{referralCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_proxy_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_id = #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcode = #{bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankaddress = #{bankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_user_type = #{dUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, referral_code = #{referralCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.d_user_type AS d_user_type, b.id AS pid FROM t_proxy_user a INNER JOIN user b ON a.user_name=b.login_name WHERE a.referral_code = #{referralCode} AND a.cid = #{cid}
SELECT a.d_user_type AS d_user_type, b.id AS pid FROM t_proxy_user a INNER JOIN user b ON a.user_name=b.login_name WHERE a.referral_code = #{referralCode}
SELECT a.d_user_type AS d_user_type, b.id AS pid FROM t_proxy_user a LEFT JOIN user b ON a.user_name=b.login_name where a.cid=#{cid} and a.user_name =#{proxyname} and b.type='1'
